--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> yah slimes would defanitly be banned (50 greenish in color archmages 
popping 
> around the screen creating elimentals...). also claric-mage and 
> cleric-archmage should be banned.
> don't you think 20's too steep? people will never use there 
charecters

I am 100% for limiting the abilites of characters who can 
summon/create other characters to summoning/creating 10 of each type 
of character they can summon/create.  That would put archmages and 
clerics more in check.

I, also, propose increasing weaknesses of halfings.  Half-elf, for 
example, would lose energy walking through trees faster than a regular 
elf.  Half-mages or half-archmages would be extremely vulnerable to 
the attacks of faeries (multiply the effect of being froven in a place 
by a factor of 5 or higher compared to normal).
